name: Slime Runner (Pavan Skipo)
description:
An endless runner game, similar to the Dino game from Google chrome. In this game you play as a slime trying to go home while avoiding zombies.

Controls: Use Up arrow or space bar to jump.

Note: This is my first game, constructive feedback is appreciated =) 

Assets (Music and some Art):

  • Music: straight - Bensound.com
  • Sounds: Lefty Studios & myfox14 from freesound.org
  • Art: Bayat games, Games2d and Me :)
